description: Manage the upgrade type of a cluster.

commands.name: az sf cluster upgrade-type set
commands.summary: Change the  upgrade type for a cluster.
commands.syntax:
az sf cluster upgrade-type set --cluster-name
                               --resource-group
                               --upgrade-mode {automatic, manual}
                               [--version]
examples: az sf cluster upgrade-type set -g group-name -c cluster1 --upgrade-mode Automatic
